document.full_text: u.s. secretary of state hillary clinton said on sunday the obama administration was committed to passing a long-delayed free trade agreement with south korea, and that the pact was ready for review by congress.
document.title: obama wants south korea fta passed this year: clinton
lines_and_colors: u.s. secretary of state hillary clinton said on sunday the obama administration was committed to passing a long-delayed free trade agreement with south korea, and that the pact was ready for review by congress.
